districts.name: Sylhet
achievements: Implemented scholarship programs for underprivileged students
districts.mission: Empower youth through education and activism in Sylhet.
districts.vision: To build a progressive and aware student community in Sylhet.

districts.name: Dhaka
districts.mission: Lead movements that safeguard students' welfare in the capital.
districts.vision: To establish a strong student voice in policy-making processes.

districts.name: Chittagong
districts.mission: Promote education and social responsibility in port city campuses.
districts.vision: To create an informed and empowered student generation.

districts.name: Rajshahi
achievements: Distributed education materials to rural schools
activities: Human chains for educational policy change
districts.mission: Ensure rural and urban student unity and support.
districts.vision: To uplift students in underrepresented communities.

districts.name: Khulna
districts.mission: Support students in emergencies and skill development.
districts.vision: To make Khulna students digitally and socially equipped.
